title: Game stop working
body: Hi, i play with loptop 2.10GHz, memory  (RAM) 4gb, before never been that when i reach leven 5 my computer stop working in game time, and then and need restart loptop and get have LeaveBuster. Mb can help me what i need to do, for can i play normal game, or this just bad loptop? sorry for my english :)

replies.body: Thx for helping, its ok. I was downloaded game from torren, need only delete game and send from website.

If I understand you correctly, it sounds like your entire PC is freezing shortly after getting into the game. If this is the case, this may be caused by the Game DVR feature inside the Game Bar in Windows 10. I recommend you disable this feature by following [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if that worked!

The Windows update ruined LoL for me too. For me it's fixed by always starting LoL through:
1) Right click pictogram on desktop.
2) Fix compability problems.
3) Recommended settings.
4) Test.
